thread.title: Electronic gold opens the week at US$1096 an ounce
thread.title_full: Electronic gold opens the week at US$1096 an ounce | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: Electronic gold opens the week at US$1096 an ounce
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors)In the first 30 minutes of spot gold trading for a new week the yellow metal is 0.3% softer at US1096 an ounce at 8:30am EST Sydney Australia.

Priced in the local money gold is hovering around A1500 an ounce based on an exchange rate of AUD / USD 0.728.

On Friday in New York gold fell 0.8% to finish at US1085.50 an ounce on the Comex.

Prices lost 4.1% for the week. 

September silver sank 1.5% to US14.488 an ounce.

September high-grade copper ended little changed at US2.383 a pound.
 
Proactive Investors Australia is the market leader in producing news articles and research reports on ASX emerging companies with distribution in Australia UK North America and Hong Kong / China.
